author: trent_vanepps
content:
Please note that Goerli Testnet will fork to London rules in about 1.5 days at block **5062605**

⭐  If you are a Goerli validator, please 2x your gas limit near the target block
⭐  If you are participating in the **Pyrmont/Prater beacon chain testnets**, you also need to upgrade your eth1 Execution client

Track here, add to your calendar - https://goerli.etherscan.io/block/countdown/5062605
